event.title: ACCU's post Christmas Social - Three Brothers....
event.description:
We kick off the new year with a social, we've not determined the location yet, but I hope you can join us for food, drinks and interesting discussion.

I've provisionally proposed Three Brothers again, given that we had fun there last time, if there are no objections? If you do know of somewhere that's good and within walking distance of Cabbot Circus then do comment, and we'll go there instead...
